short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Combination of many Homestar Runner scripts. Version 4.3.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A combination of several useful scripts for Homestar Runner cartoons:
* View cartoons in full-screen
* Pause/play and seek controls
* Subtitles and captions, maintained by users of the Homestar Runner Wiki
* A convenient link to the cartoon's page on the Homestar Runner Wiki
* Easy links to move forward and backward in series eg Strong Bad Email

Note: If you have any flash-blocker extensions installed, you may need to whitelist www.homestarrunner.com in it for this extension to work correctly.
